title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick Sees Opportunities in Biotech
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick Sees Opportunities in Biotech
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ryan Detrick Senior Market Strategist Lpl Financial Discussing the impact of the House passing Obamacare repeal on the markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
